data.title: Episcopal School in Shreveport, LA
data.meta_description: St. Mark's Cathedral School in Shreveport, LA provides excellence in education to students in preschool through 8th grade. Visit our website to learn more.
data.text:
Summer at St. Mark's offers 5 weeks of traditional day camp for students entering Preschool 3 through 5th grade plus a wide variety of specialty camps for students entering kindergarten through 8th grade. Extended hours available. Registration for St. Mark's families begins Monday, March 4 and is open to all on Monday, March 11.

As an Episcopal school and a ministry of St. Markâ€™s Cathedral, an important part of our mission is fostering spiritual development.

We are committed to providing enrichment beyond the essentials in order to develop the whole child and help our students reach their potential. We offer a variety of sports and enrichment activities that take place during and outside of school.
